name: The Legend of Golden Beard Oil
name_original: The Legend of Golden Beard Oil
description:
Defeat Goldbeard's undead crew to claim the legendary pirate's treasure.

This game was made for 7DRL Challenger 2022.

Controls:

WASD to move

Drag cards onto squares to use them

Open treasure chests by standing near them

Hover over the enemies to check their health, attack, and attack pattern

Credits:

Programming, Music - gearless_june

Art - Amberfall

Level Design, Game Balance - Busy Hamster/Jeffrey
